title: About
ps: This site is an example of using the HtmlTemplate module to create a web site.
The "index" link in the sidebar goes to the index page, as does clicking on the site name at the top of the page.
The "templates", "pages", and "settings" links in the sidebar can be used to inspect the JSON that defines the site.
The links on the page titles will soon go to individual pages. Soon thereafter, I'll add some CSS to make it look prettier.
